contest-event.event-date:
April 8, 1979 D North East Midlands Contest (Third Section)
North East Midlands Contest (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest North East Midlands Contest north-east-midlands-contest-third-section
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Theatre, Mansfield, Nottinghamshire Prizes - 1st £45 and trophy, 2nd £35 and trophy, 3rd £25. March contest - 1st Creswell, 2nd Riddings, 3rd Kirkby. 9 bands competed.
Jan. 3, 2015, 1:57 p.m. March 29, 2017, 10:50 a.m.
1 Creswell Colliery Band Mervyn Griffiths Raymond Overture
2 Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band Roy Walters
3 Riddings Band W. J. Saint
4 Clipstone Colliery Welfare J. A. Richardson
Unknown Result Cotgrave D. Quinn
Unknown Result Harworth Brass E. Phasey
Unknown Result Maltby Miners Welfare Band Julie Holling
Unknown Result Pleasley Colliery Welfare Band Brian Draper
Unknown Result Worksop Miners Welfare Band Ken Morgan
